text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the Acer Helios 300 PH317-51-7578 17.3" GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop - ONLY @ NEWEGG is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Helios 300 PH317-51-7578 17.3" GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop - ONLY @ NEWEGG!

The Acer Helios 300 PH317-51-7578 17.3" GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop - ONLY @ NEWEGG does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Acer Helios 300 PH317-51-7578 17.3" GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop - ONLY @ NEWEGG is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the Acer Helios 300 PH317-51-7578 17.3" GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home VR Ready Gaming Laptop - ONLY @ NEWEGG. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
